text: It is an American media franchise consists of of horror movies and television series. First there was the 1986 Novel It the Novel, It Miniseries in 1990. Then a Duology was made from 2017 - 2019 by Andres Walter Muschietti, It (2017) retroactively also known as It Chapter One was made in 2017 and It Chapter Two in 2019 and an upcoming television in 2025 called [Welcome to Derry] which will take place in 1960s. ==Movies and television== Year TV show Network Language 1990 It ABC English Year Film Language 2017 It English 2019 It Chapter Two English Category:Media franchises
title: It (franchise)
